Text: Bah... I just noticed that the title says "1973" whereas the file is correctly "1971". Ah well, minor typo.

Five days is all it took for leeches who don't give back what they take to kill this torrent down to zero seeds. I'm reseeding it but, as noted, very slowly given that I'm also seeding others. The first died in only three days.

Eventually I stop contributing.
Thank you to the seeds that returned (or stayed.) Because I don't need to keep seeding this and other torrents, I've made a new one...
